descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a group of blocks inside of 4 block corners.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...zoom in to the group of blocks
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...change the group of blocks in the center to the color of the surrounding 4 blocks.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a black background with two different colors. One color will be four corners. The other color will be a set of grid cell within the grid size the four other color cell create.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size....is the size of the image within the set of four cell
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...copy the grid bounded by the four corner cells

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...two block patterns of different colors. The first set of colored blocks should be on the inside. The second set of block colors should be on the outside of the first set and surrounding it on each corner.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...should be smaller than the input grid size. It should match the height and width size of the inside block colors.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...Copy the inside colored blocks of the input and then change all the block colors to the colors of the blocks that is on the outside of the input image.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see... shape inside the random grid.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...the random grid size shape.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...fill the same color to the inside shape of the outside random grid.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a shape of one color surrounded by 4 single squares of another color.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...will be the same size as the inside of the single 4 squares in the input grid.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...use the color of the single 4 boxes and replicate the shapes from the input grid.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...four colored squares that look like the corners of a box. Within this box is a shape colored with a different color. The background is black.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...should be the size of what is inside the square made by the four colored squares. Copy everything inside.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...change the color of the colored shape to the color of the four corner squares.

annotated_phrases.phrase: a shape of one color surrounded by 4 single squares of another color.
will be the same size as the inside of the single 4 squares in the input grid.
use the color of the single 4 boxes and replicate the shapes from the input grid.
